remixlab.proscene
Class DrawingUtils

java.lang.Object
  remixlab.proscene.DrawingUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class DrawingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
implements processing.core.PConstants

Utility class that implements some drawing methods used among proscene classes.

cone

public static void cone(processing.core.PGraphics3D p3d,
                        int detail,
                        float x,
                        float y,
                        float r,
                        float h)
Draws a cone along the p3d positive z axis, with its base centered at (x,y), height h, and radius r.

The code of this function was adapted from http://processinghacks.com/hacks:cone Thanks to Tom Carden.

See Also:
cone(PGraphics3D, int, float, float, float, float, float)

drawArrow

public static void drawArrow(processing.core.PGraphics3D p3d,
                             float length,
                             float radius)
Draws a 3D arrow along the parent positive Z axis.

length and radius define its geometry.

Use drawArrow(PApplet, PVector, PVector, float) to place the arrow in 3D.

drawArrow

drawGrid

public static void drawGrid(processing.core.PGraphics3D p3d,
                            float size,
                            int nbSubdivisions)
Draws a grid in the XY plane, centered on (0,0,0) (defined in the current coordinate system).

size (processing scene units) and nbSubdivisions define its geometry.

See Also:
drawAxis(PApplet, float)

Convenience wrapper function that simply calls drawCamera((PGraphics3D) parent.g, camera, color, drawFarPlane, 1.0f).

                              Camera camera,

                              boolean drawFarPlane,
                              float scale)
Convenience wrapper function that simply calls drawCamera((PGraphics3D) parent.g, camera, color, drawFarPlane, scale).

See Also:
drawCamera(PGraphics3D, Camera, int, boolean, float)

drawCamera

public static void drawCamera(processing.core.PGraphics3D p3d,
                              Camera camera,
                              int color,
                              boolean drawFarPlane,
                              float scale)
Draws a representation of the camera in the p3d 3D virtual world using color.

The near and far planes are drawn as quads, the frustum is drawn using lines and the camera up vector is represented by an arrow to disambiguate the drawing.

When drawFarPlane is false, only the near plane is drawn. scale can be used to scale the drawing: a value of 1.0 (default) will draw the Camera's frustum at its actual size.

Note: The drawing of a Scene's own Scene.camera() should not be visible, but may create artifacts due to numerical imprecisions.
